string.text: OKP-7 Sight (dovetail mount) (BaS)

The original design can be used under any conditions, and also, if necessary, allows the use of a standard mechanical device. The main feature of the sight is the mount of the reflector without a mechanical frame, covering an appreciable part of the firing sector. Reflector protection in extreme conditions is provided by a thin and durable metal visor, which practically does not interfere with firing.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
Trijicon RMR Sight (BaS)

Trijicon RMR (RMR) is a compact reflex sight. The RM07C is an LED sight powered by a standard CR2032 battery. Housed in rugged forged aluminum, it's extremely tough yet lightweight. The easy-to-use adjusters with audible clicks allow for quick windage and elevation adjustments. Featuring eight available brightness settings, the reticle can be manually adjusted by pressing the plus or minus buttons on either side of the unit. To switch to auto adjust mode, simply press both buttons simultaneously and release.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Aimpoint Micro T1 Sight (high spacer) (BaS)

No matter what your mission, the size and weight of your equipment is a critical factor. With the Aimpoint® Micro T-1, Aimpoint has introduced an aiming system that provides the performance of our full-sized sights in a small package.
 Since its introduction in 2007, the Aimpoint® Micro T-1 has become very popular worldwide due to its size, light weight and robust build quality.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
EKP 8-02 "Cobra" Sight (BaS)

The Cobra sight provides confident aiming in natural light conditions (bright sunny day, deep twilight and moonlit night) due to the presence of 16 levels of manual brightness adjustment of the aiming mark. The location of the aiming mark and target in the same plane allows for aiming with both one and two eyes, which creates an unlimited field of view for the shooter, and conduct effective high-speed shooting at quickly moving, small and suddenly appearing for a short time targets.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
ELCAN SpecterDR Scope (BaS)

The SpecterDR 4x/1x Dual Role Optical Sight represents a revolution in optical sight design. The world’s first truly dual field of view combat optical sight, the SpecterDR switches instantly from a 4x magnified sight to a 1x CQB sight with the throw of a lever. Unlike zoom sights, the SpecterDR offers an optimized optical path and identical eye relief in both 4x and 1x modes.
 Depending upon the situation, the user may adjust the sight to illuminate the cross-hair or just a brilliant red dot in the center. In 1x mode, the SpecterDR has by far the largest field of view in the industry. In 4x mode the SpecterDR offers a generous field of view, long eye relief, and ELCAN’S legendary crystal clear image.
 The SpecterDR 4x/1x offers the best single solution for both Medium Range and CQB engagements and is designed to withstand the rigors of modern professional use. (The scope has back up iron sights on top of it).
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
PSO-1Ì Scope (no eyecup) (BaS)

Military grade sniper optical scope PSO 1M2-1, manufactured by Zenit-Belomo. This optical scope is designed for precision sight fire with Special Sniper Rifle (VSS) and Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD) on the variety of targets with 4x magnification and 6 degree FOV.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
OKP-7 Sight (For Picatinny/weaver) (BaS)

The original design of OKP sights allows firing from unstable positions in rapidly changing conditions, reduces the operator fatigue, and, if necessary, allows unhindered use of base mechanical sights. The key feature of this sight is a rimless reflector attachment that doesn't block any field of fire sections; instead, reflector is protected by thin and durable visor that is almost un-noticeable when firing. This variant is installed on the dovetail type mount.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Docter Sight III (BaS)

The Docter Optic Sight III Red Dot Sight features a high-strength monoblock housing, water-tight desing, infinitely adjustable reticle, three magnet-controlled illuminated dot intensities, automatic illuminated dot regulation, anatomically adapted brightness progression, battery indicator, control cap with safety strap eyelet, and easy mounting.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
1P59 "Giperon" pancratic sniper Scope (BaS)

The Giperon pancratic sniper sights are designed for target reconnaissance and aimed fire from sniper rifles, and providing for automatic input of the sighting angle during target ranging. Compared to the organic PSO-1 sight, the 1P59 Giperon pancratic sight improves the effectiveness of SVD fire 1.3-2 times (depending on the target range and size) through a greater magnification, a more accurate rangefinder, combining target ranging and sighting angle input operations, as well as the sighting angle input scale incorporated within the field of view of the sight.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
1PN93-4 Night Sight (BaS)

The 1PN93 SVD night sights are designed for target detection and recognition and aimed fire at point-blank range under natural night illumination conditions. 1PN93-4 is Gen. 3 of night optic.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
PKS-07 (NOT IN USE) (BaS)

PKS-07 Tactical Sniper Sight w/ Dual Black/Red Rangefinding Reticle, Universal AK/SKS/SVD Version is a unique sniper scope based on collimator technology. The scope was created in LOMO (Saint-Petersburg, Russia) especially for the VSK-94 sniper platform. As it was technologically more advanced as well as lighter, the Russian military has chosen it over the PSO-3 as the standard optic for the SV-98. We offer an AA version with linearly marked elevation turrets, exclusively imported by Kalinka Optics It fits AK and SVD rifles and is optimized for use on SVD, Tigr, PSL Mosin and similar rifles. It's fully coated prismatic lens system provides a remarkable, high contrast, wide angle field of view and lower eyepiece location for comfortable aiming. The scope has an illuminated rangefinding reticle. The scope has POSP-style windage and elevation adjustments (every elevation turret' click moves POI by 4.5 cm at 100 m, every windage turret' click moves POI by 2.5 cm at 100 m). The special protective lens coatings protect the scope from scratching and fouling in the extreme battlefield conditions where it was designed to operate. Notice the extreme temperature rating on this scope, you'll quit before it will. It comes with a cover case and rubber eyepiece. A definite BEST CHOICE!
Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x24 Scope (BaS)

From close quarters to long range target engagements, the Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x24mm incorporates everything Military, Law Enforcement and Competition shooters need into one extremely versatile riflescope. The illuminated front focal plane reticles provide accurate range estimation throughout the entire zoom range. Eight brightness settings ensure optimal visibility of the illuminated reticle in all lighting conditions and are compatible with night vision devices. An off position between each numbered brightness setting ensures long battery life and nearly instant return to the desired reticle intensity.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Meprolight M21 Sight (BaS)

Meprolight Mepro M21 is a battle-proven red dot sight, tested in the harshest conditions imaginable. It doesn’t work on a battery but is powered by a fibre optic collector system during the day and by tritium at night – when all other sights fail, M21 will continue to work.
 With a QD-detachable mount, you will be able to mount and dismount this sight from the Picatinny platform in a matter of seconds.
 it can be paired with night vision goggles and scopes which greatly increases its usability. Meprolight is an Israeli company, founded in 1990. They offer includes day optical devices, night vision devices, thermal imaging devices, self-illuminated night sights, etc. Their products have been tested to withstand the harshest conditions imaginable, which is why they are popular with the military and law enforcement. The company complies with NATO and US military specifications as well as International MIL Standards.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Aimpoint Micro T1 Sight (low spacer) (BaS)

No matter what your mission, the size and weight of your equipment is a critical factor. With the Aimpoint® Micro T-1, Aimpoint has introduced an aiming system that provides the performance of our full-sized sights in a small package.
 Since its introduction in 2007, the Aimpoint® Micro T-1 has become very popular worldwide due to its size, light weight and robust build quality.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Aimpoint PRO Sight (BaS)

Aimpoint Patrol Rifle Optic is designed with input from a distinguished group of current and former professionals. The Patrol Rifle Optic incorporates many never before seen features to maximize this sight's performance within the challenging conditions faced by modern law enforcement.
 The Aimpoint® PRO sight comes in a ready-to-go kit at a budget friendly price, a concept that appeals strongly to Law Enforcement units.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
1P76 "Rakurs-À" Sight (for Dovetail mount) (BaS)

The 1P76 optical sight designed for battlefield surveillance, target selection, target ranging and aimed fire against luminous and illuminated targets during the day, at dusk and at night.
 The sights have a wide field of view that allows for quick terrain observation in a fast-moving combat situation simultaneously with the naked eye and through the sight without loss of target visibility.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
PK-A Sight (BaS)

Another long time favorite, the PK-A is a sturdy and robust red dot tube optic. Originally appearing to be an adaptation of the original PSO SVD optic, the PK-A has a similar construction and the same style of hammer grey finish.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
PGO-7V Sight (BaS)
The PGO-7 optical sight is the main sight of the RPG-7 hand grenade launcher. It serves to aim a grenade launcher when firing at targets located at different ranges.
EKP 8-18 "Kobra" Sight (BaS)

Kobra Military 8-18 Red Dot Weaver Rifle Scope, Screw Mount. The world famous Kobra is an open collimator "red dot" combat optic using laser-generated "heads-up display" (HUD) technology to superimpose a reticle pattern onto a filtered lens which acts as an aiming device for the shooter. This system presents an unobstructed field of view, in 1x power which allows for extremely comfortable, "both eyes open" shooting.
 On average, most users will see a 1.5 times faster target acquisition and a 50% smaller shot group at 100 meters, in comparison to the iron sights. It is designed for engaging fast moving targets and targets appearing for a short period of time in close quarters and urban combat situations in various light conditions.
 It provides clear targeting from 104 lx to 10-2 lx (daylight, twilight and moonlight), one- or two-eye targeting, is very effective when shooting from moving vehicles, and allows for perfect kill shots on fast-moving, small and spontaneously appearing targets.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
Deltapoint PRO Sight (BaS)

The DeltaPoint Pro is proof that you don’t have to compromise performance, even on a small sight. Its incredibly wide field-of-view and crystal-clear glass dominates the competition, while its rugged aluminum housing and steel sheath ensure it will perform in the harshest conditions. Ease-of-use was also a focus when designing this elite red dot sight, which is why we put an easy access battery compartment on top and gave it click-adjustments for more precision. And this isn't just a pistol sight either; the DP Pro is just as at home on ARs, shotguns, and pretty much anything else that goes bang.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
EOTech XPS3-0 Sight (BaS)

The XPS3 is smaller and lighter than all other holographic weapon sights but just as fast. Law enforcement officers and hunters appreciate the light weight and compact size for carrying convenience on the job and in the woods. The XPS3 runs on a single 123 battery. The single-lithium-battery configuration allows more rail space, leaving more room for rear-iron sights, magnifiers, or a night vision mount.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
PN-23 Night Sight (BaS)

The PN23 is a dedicated night vision sight. It features a compact size teamed with a useful 3x magnification range. This provides an impressive 400 meter recognition range with a very wide field of view at 12°. The illuminated reticle is designed to provide both speed and precision.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
EOTS-62 Scope (BaS)

(In current beta version of BaS this scope is not working. Don't buy!) The Electroptical Targeting System EOTS-62, was developed by in secret laboratories inside the Zone for use with ultra-precise weapon known as “Type 62”. It can be mounted on a “Picatinny rail” type mount. Has a target detection function.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP Scope (BaS)

March Tactical 3-24x42 First Focal Plane scope, reliable and accurate with ammunition of any power. Made by japanese DEON Optical Design Corporation company. The March-F 3-24x42 Tactical Riflescope is the go to scope for both long range hunters and tactical shooters all over the world. The scope has a 42mm objective lens made of extra low dispersion optical glass that allows for a bright and clear sight picture in most light conditions. The scope features tactical exposed turrets for windage and elevation, parallax correction from 10 yards to infinity, and an Illuminated tactical reticle in the first focal plane.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
1P76 "Rakurs-À" Sight (for Picatinny/weaver) (BaS)

The 1P76 optical sight designed for battlefield surveillance, target selection, target ranging and aimed fire against luminous and illuminated targets during the day, at dusk and at night.
 The sights have a wide field of view that allows for quick terrain observation in a fast-moving combat situation simultaneously with the naked eye and through the sight without loss of target visibility.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Aimpoint CompM4s Sight (for Picatinny/weaver) (BaS)

The Aimpoint® CompM4s sight, with low battery compartment, belongs to the CompM4 series of sights which are the finest sights Aimpoint has ever produced. Improvements include advanced energy efficiency that provides up to 8 years of continuous use from a single AA battery!\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
SUSAT Scope for Picatinny/weaver mount (BaS)

SUSAT is 4X optical sight, developed in the UK at the Royal Arms Research and Development Center. Manufactured by Avimo as well as United Scientific Instruments. It is most often used for aimed fire from light small arms at medium and long distances. (The scope has back up iron sights on top of it).\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
1P78 Kashtan Scope (BaS)

1P78 is one of the newest optics to enter into service with the Russian armed forces. The design is similar in concept to the ACOG with a relatively low magnification (2.8x) and ability to point and shoot without having to adjust any controls.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
1PN93-1 Night Sight (BaS)

The generation 2 night sight with fixed magnification (4 diopters). Option 1PN93-1 is designed for combat in conditions of poor visibility at medium distances. Designed for mounting on weapons with standard dovetail mount (like Warsaw Treaty countries).\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
Firefield Kemper XL-M Reflex Sight (BaS)

The Kemper XL-M is a panoramic open red dot sight, ideal for high-speed shooting, offhand shooting and shooting at moving targets. Unlike the civilian model, the "M" -armic variant of the sight is made of a more durable aluminum alloy - i.e. Specially designed for harsh environments. Installed on Weaver/Picatinny rails.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
1P29 "Tulpan" Scope (No Eyecup) (BaS)

%c[ui_gray_1]The USP-1 sight (index 1P29) has an optical arrangement with a prism-erecting system. Sighting angles are set mechanically by turning the sight body relative to the weapon mounting bracket. Requires no batteries as it is tritium illuminated. The ranging scale at the edge of the sight's field of view provides a means to find visually the range of up to 1200 m of a target 1.5 m high.
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]good
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Reticle pattern: %c[ui_gray_1]PSU-1
Trijicon ACOG & RMR Tactical Kit (for Picatinny/weaver) (BaS)

This tactical kit includes two scopes made by Trijicon US company, a Trijicon ACOG BAC 5.56 BDC scope and a Trijicon RMR sight for rifles that have Picatinny or weaver mounts. This setup allows shooter to use his rifle on short and long distances without any discomfort.
Leupold & RMR Tactical Kit (for Picatinny/weaver) (BaS)

This tactical kit includes a Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS scope and a Trijicon RMR sight for rifles that have Picatinny or weaver mounts. This setup allows shooter to use his rifle on short and long distances without any discomfort.
PSO & RMR Tactical Kit (for dovetail mount and Picatinny/weaver) (BaS)

This tactical kit includes a PSO-1Ì2-1 scope and a Trijicon RMR sight for rifles that have both dovetail and Picatinny mounts. This setup allows shooter to use his rifle on short and long distances without any discomfort.
SpecterDR & RMR Tactical Kit (for Picatinny/weaver) (BaS)

This tactical kit includes a SpecterDR DFOV14-C2 1-4x scope and a Trijicon RMR sight for rifles that have Picatinny or weaver mounts. This setup allows shooter to use his rifle on short and long distances without any discomfort.
1P78 Kashtan & RMR Tactical Kit (for dovetail mount and Picatinny/weaver) (BaS)

This tactical kit includes a 1P78 Kashtan scope and a Trijicon RMR sight for rifles that have both dovetail and Picatinny mounts. This setup allows shooter to use his rifle on short and long distances without any discomfort.
PN-23 "Nozzle" Night Sight (BaS)

%c[ui_gray_1]A variant of the PN-23 sight, repeating the functionality of such systems as STIC - i.e. the sight is attached in front of the standard one.\n %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:\n %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Some sniper rifles with integrated scopes (BaS)
